languages.text: "Но однажды жители узнали, что такое тьма. Словно смерч, обрушились на планету проклятые еретики, продавшиеся {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагу{/g}. С неба летели снаряды, что опустошали целые города, и жгли сады, и кровью верных наполняли русла рек. Дым и копоть скрыли небосклон и тысячу звезд, что сияли над миром".

traits.locale_text: "Но однажды жители узнали, что такое тьма. Словно смерч, обрушились на планету проклятые еретики, продавшиеся Архиврагу. С неба летели снаряды, что опустошали целые города, и жгли сады, и кровью верных наполняли русла рек. Дым и копоть скрыли небосклон и тысячу звезд, что сияли над миром".

languages.text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."
languages.original_text: "Но однажды жители узнали, что такое тьма. Словно смерч, обрушились на планету проклятые еретики, продавшиеся {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагу{/g}. С неба летели снаряды, что опустошали целые города, и жгли сады, и кровью верных наполняли русла рек. Дым и копоть скрыли небосклон и тысячу звезд, что сияли над миром".

Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

"But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

languages.text: “但突然有一天，人们明白了黑暗的含义。一大群该死的异端分子仿佛风暴一样降临到了这颗行星，他们将灵魂出卖给了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}。炮弹从天而降，城市被夷平，花园被烧毁，河里流满了虔诚之人的鲜血。硝烟与烟尘遮天蔽日，吞没了曾经照亮这个世界的群星。”
languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

traits.locale_text: “但突然有一天，人们明白了黑暗的含义。一大群该死的异教徒仿佛风暴一样降临到了这颗行星，他们将灵魂出卖给了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}。炮弹从天而降，城市被夷平，花园被烧毁，河里流满了虔诚之人的鲜血。硝烟与烟尘遮天蔽日，吞没了曾经照亮这个世界的群星。”

languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the Archenemy descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

languages.text: «Pero un día la gente descubrió el significado de la oscuridad. Como una tormenta, unos malditos herejes que se habían vendido al {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} descendieron sobre el planeta. Del cielo cayeron obuses que arrasaron ciudades enteras, incineraron los jardines e inundaron los ríos con la sangre de los fieles. Los cielos azules se llenaron de humo y hollín, cubriendo los miles de estrellas que habían iluminado el mundo».
languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

traits.locale_text: «Pero un día la gente descubrió el significado de la oscuridad. Como una tormenta, unos malditos herejes que se habían vendido al {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} descendieron sobre el planeta. Del cielo cayeron obuses que arrasaron ciudades enteras, incineraron los jardines e inundaron los ríos con la sangre de los fieles. Los cielos azules se llenaron de humo y hollín, cubriendo los miles de estrellas que habían iluminado el mundo».

languages.text: 「しかしある日、人々は闇の意味を知った。嵐のように、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}に身を売った呪われた異端者たちがこの惑星に降り立った。空からは砲弾が飛び交い、街は荒廃し、庭園は焼かれ、河川敷は信者の血で満たされた。煙と煤は空を飲み込み、かつて世界を照らしていた千の星々を飲み込んだ」
languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

traits.locale_text: 「しかしある日、人々は闇の意味を知った。嵐のように、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}に身を売った呪われた異端者たちがこの惑星に降り立った。空からは砲弾が飛び交い、街は荒廃し、庭園は焼かれ、河川敷は信者の血で満たされた。煙と煤は空を飲み込み、かつて世界を照らしていた千の星々を飲み込んだ」

languages.text: "Doch eines Tages lernten die Bewohner die Bedeutung der Dunkelheit kennen. Wie ein Sturm fegten verfluchte Ketzer über den Planeten hinweg, die sich an den {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} verkauft hatten. Geschosse fielen vom Himmel, die ganze Städte verwüsteten, die Gärten verbrannten und die Flussbetten mit dem Blut der Gläubigen füllten. Rauch und Ruß verschluckten den Himmel und die eintausend Sterne, die einst über der Welt geschienen hatten."
languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

traits.locale_text: "Doch eines Tages lernten die Bewohner die Bedeutung der Dunkelheit kennen. Wie ein Sturm fegten verfluchte Ketzer über den Planeten hinweg, die sich an den {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} verkauft hatten. Geschosse fielen vom Himmel, die ganze Städte verwüsteten, die Gärten verbrannten und die Flussbetten mit dem Blut der Gläubigen füllten. Rauch und Ruß verschluckten den Himmel und die eintausend Sterne, die einst über der Welt geschienen hatten."

languages.text: « Mais un jour, son peuple apprit ce qu'était l'obscurité. Telle une pluie torrentielle, des hérétiques maudits qui avaient vendu leur âme au {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} s'abattirent sur la planète. Des obus chutèrent des cieux et dévastèrent des villes entières, brûlant les jardins et abreuvant les ruisseaux du sang des fidèles. La fumée et la suie occultèrent les cieux et les milliers d'étoiles qui avaient jusque alors illuminé ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

traits.locale_text: « Mais un jour, son peuple apprit ce qu'était l'obscurité. Telle une pluie torrentielle, des hérétiques maudits qui avaient vendu leur âme au {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} s'abattirent sur la planète. languages.text: "Lakin günün birinde bu insanlar karanlığın ne olduğunu görmüş. Ruhunu {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'na{/g} satmış melun kâfirler, bir fırtına misali gezegene inmiş. Gökten yağan bombalar, koca şehirleri yerle bir edip bahçeleri küle çevirmiş. Nehir yatakları, inançlıların kanlarıyla dolup taşmış. Gökleri ve dünyayı aydınlatan binlerce yıldızı dumanlar yutmuş."
languages.original_text: "But one day, the people learned the meaning of darkness. Like a storm, accursed heretics who had sold themselves to the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} descended upon the planet. Shells flew from the sky that desolated whole cities, and burned the gardens, and filled the riverbeds with the blood of the faithful. Smoke and soot swallowed the skies and the thousand stars that had once shone over the world."

traits.locale_text: "Lakin günün birinde bu insanlar karanlığın ne olduğunu görmüşler. Ruhunu {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'na satmış melun kâfirler, bir fırtına gibi inmiş gezegene. Gökten yağan bombalar koca şehirleri yerle bir edip bahçeleri küle çevirmiş. Nehir yatakları, inançlıların kanlarıyla dolup taşmış. Gökleri ve dünyayı aydınlatan binlerce yıldızı dumanlar yutmuş."
